name: nFactorial AI
tagline: Video calls with world's best minds as your personal tutors
description: MasterClass from any legend for any topic featuring Paul Graham, Elon Musk, Terence Tao, Andrej Karpathy, Morgan Housel, Bill Ackman and Marc Andreessen. Watch them share their screens and give you lectures on the topics of your choice.

name: Hyprnote
tagline: AI Notepad for Private Meetings ‚Äî fully on your device
description: Hyprnote is an AI notepad that captures your meetings and instantly turns them into personalized summaries, enhanced by your quick notes. It runs entirely on-device, keeping every word private ‚Äî perfect for secure and air-gapped environments.

name: My Juno Health: AI Doctor
tagline: Smarter Health. Sharper Mind. Reach Your Peak Productivity
description: Fully personalized to empower you to live your best life, achieve your highest goals, and unlock your full potential. It's your partner in vitality with a personalized wellness coach in your pocket. Helps fuel your ambition and enhances your daily experience.

name: Dad Reply
tagline: Auto-respond with a üëç - Minimal effort - Maximum ambiguity
description: Dad Reply is the Chrome extension that lets you respond to emails with the universal symbol of low-effort acknowledgment: a üëç emoji. Just click the button and it auto-replies to the currently open email with a single thumbs up. No typing. Maximum Dad energy.

name: SuperCraft
tagline: Figma for designing physical products
description: SuperCraft lets teams design physical products with natural language

name: Weave
tagline: The coolest, bestest, newest AI product for engineers.
description: Weave is a engineering intelligence platform that combines LLMs & ML to tell you exactly how well you're using AI and shows you how to improve.

name: Rid
tagline: Sell with a Text
description: We make selling easier than buying. Just send us photos. We handle the rest. We research your product, find markets for them, negotiate with buyers, answer questions, and handle delivery/pickup.

name: Sixteen
tagline: Your Focus is worth Fighting for
description: Sixteen helps you block distractions‚Äîuntil you ship. It syncs with your Linear workspace and unlocks your screen only after you finish your tasks. Guilt-free scrolling starts after the deep work.

name: Embedding Atlas
tagline: Compute & interactively visualize large embeddings
description: Embedding Atlas is a tool that provides interactive visualizations for large embeddings. It allows you to visualize, cross-filter, and search embeddings and metadata. Open sourced by Apple.

name: Zpeakr
tagline: Fluency starts when your fear shuts up. Zpeakr helps.
description: Master any language naturally through AI-powered conversation. Learn English, Spanish, French, and Italian with real-time feedback from AI tutors that challenge you, correct your mistakes, and make you speak ‚Äî anytime, anywhere.

name: Convo - Chat Insights
tagline: Conversation insights app
description: Transform your SMS conversations into actionable insights with AI analysis. Import your Android SMS backup, get sentiment analysis, topic identification, and smart reply suggestions. All data stays local for privacy. Built with React + TypeScript.

name: Inbox Hero
tagline: AI Email Manager For Microsoft 365
description: AI-powered email organization that works seamlessly within Microsoft 365. Enhanced Focus folders with superior categorization that actually understands your workflow. View more details on https://inboxhero.win

name: Yeamt
tagline: Sick of AI tools and endless work? Try 30 seconds of chaos
description: Fed up with endless meetings, Slack msgs piling up, and another AI-saas promising to ‚Äúfix‚Äù everything? same. so i made something gloriously useless - Yeamt. 30s of pure, proud chaos: cover greens, dodge reds. miss 3 = game over. my best: 150-drop your score!
